body: evidenox is a real g, said it well. really good happy ending, the guy really gave her what she always wanted and couldnt find by showing her some real affection, so now shes happy with having found a boyfriend who actually likes her and cares about her, and the MC totally won big by getting an insanely hot crazy girl emotionally attached to him because he was the first guy to show her the love which she didnt get to feel with other guys

I know this is porn, but some people need to take a closer look at this story.  In the prostitution scene in the beginning the sex wasn't fulfilling for her and she recieved the name-brand purse. When she finally has the fulfilling sex with the second guy -she leaves the purse behind- making the scene in the beginning not just unfulfilling, but ultimately -meaningless- to her as the only meaning she put on it was receiving items. Also take a look at and contrast how the artist draws her post-sex expressions in the beginning compared to the end. She has gone from  dead-faced to happy. She is clearly done with prostitution and she has found fulfillment. Also I do know this is porn, but some artists like to put more into their work than just pure eroticism: Date, Ashiomi Masato and from time to time Hinasaki Yo among them.
